name: Super Cocoto Kart
description:
Newest update:

-Added a tiny Cacodemon in the background of the title screen

Hey everyone! I'm releasing this game as a way to make up for the lack of Peepy Commits a Crime, I promise that game is still underway. Anyways, Super Cocoto Kart is what would happen if Super Mario Kart, and Cocoto Kart Racer had a crossover. I had to remove some characters from Mario to make sure that the races weren't super crowded, so I'm sorry about that. Hope you enjoy!
